Actions.Name: Slice and Dice
Actions.Effects: May dash 1 before or after attack.

Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Effects: A foe in range 3 takes 2 damage, ignoring vigor. If they are bloodied, they take 2 damage twice instead, ignoring vigor.

Actions.Name: Rake
Actions.AreaEffect: Foes in the area take [fray] damage.
Actions.Effects: The Revenant may teleport to any space in the area after this action resolves.

Actions.Name: Horrify
Actions.Description: The Revenant releases a bone chilling scream.
Actions.AreaEffect: Characters in the area must save or take 2[D]+[fray], or [D]+[fray] on a successful save. Reduce this damage by [D] for every character past the first in the area, to a minimum of [fray] damage.
Actions.SpecialInterrupt: The Revenant can take this action as an interrupt when bloodied.
